summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account, detailing various incoming and outgoing transfers, including significant cash management transfers and payments to individuals. It provides insights into the financial activities associated with the account during December 2018.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield

connections.description: Stewart Oldfield is an account representative for Deutsche Bank.
Lesley Groff is a recipient of funds transferred from a Deutsche Bank account.
Lawrence P Visoski is a recipient of funds transferred from a Deutsche Bank account.
David N Rodgers is a recipient of funds transferred from a Deutsche Bank account.

events.title: Account Balance Summary
events.description: The document provides a summary of account balances as of December 1, 2018.

events.title: Significant Cash Management Transfers
events.description: Multiple outgoing money transfers totaling $54,500,000.00 were made on this date.

events.title: Ending Balance Report
events.description: The document concludes with the ending balance of the account as of December 31, 2018.

keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $5,487,706.86 on December 1, 2018.
A total of $54,500,000.00 was transferred out of the account on December 19, 2018.
The document lists multiple outgoing transfers to individuals including Lesley Groff, Lawrence P Visoski, and David N Rodgers.
The ending balance of the account as of December 31, 2018, was $915,216.85.
There are no service charges or overdraft fees reported for the statement period.
